content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I am sure you will find my apartment quite appealing. So, let's get down to business. What is the highest price you are willing to pay for this beautiful, centrally located one-bedroom unit?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 600 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 600 euros per month? I'm sorry, but that's far below my expectations for such a prime location and a brand-new apartment. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality and convenience of this property. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Let's meet halfway then. How about 700 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 700 euros per month is still not reflective of the value of this apartment. I'm sure you can appreciate that the city center location, combined with the modern amenities and proximity to all amenities, warrants a higher price. Would you be open to increasing your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can consider increasing my offer. Let's say 750 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 750 euros per month is a bit closer to what I had in mind, but still not quite there. This apartment is in high demand, and I'm confident that someone will be willing to pay a premium for it. Would you be willing to go up to 850 euros per month? That's a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a significant increase. Let me think about it.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, take your time. If you decide that 850 euros per month is within your budget, I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be an excellent investment. It's a rare find in the city center, and the new construction ensures low maintenance costs for you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [800] Euro!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept 800 euros per month. That's below the price I'm seeking for this apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the value of this prime location and is willing to pay a fair price for it. If you're not willing to pay the 850 euros per month, I'd rather not continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
